videos.description: Dejan Vasiljevic drives it inside and lays in a nice basket in the first half against Boston University.
videos.headline: Miami's Vasiljevic fakes triple and hits layup

videos.description: Max Mahoney beats the halftime buzzer with a nice finish at the rim to tie the game at 30-30 against Miami.
videos.headline: Boston University's Mahoney tips it in to tie game

videos.description: Freshman Lonnie Walker IV puts in a couple of nice triples in the second half against Boston University.
videos.headline: Miami's Walker knocks in back-to-back 3s
